Our contribution:
• Automatic approach to associate semantics to tags relying 
on DBpedia as semantic resource.
• Disambiguation algorithm inspired by well known 
information retrieval techniques
• Several context definition as a way to ameliorate tagging 
data scarceness in the disambiguation process.
